sentences.en: Also now I have gained on him in the question of sustenance.
sentences.cn: 再说,眼下在食物方面我也比它占优势.

sentences.en: Conscious killing beyond the needs of sustenance is a violation.
sentences.cn: 生存需要之外的有意识的杀害是一种侵害.

sentences.en: Great satire needs the sustenance of great fable.
sentences.cn: 伟大的讽刺作品需要伟大的怪异故事来滋养它.

sentences.en: He gave money for the sustenance of a poor family.
sentences.cn: 他把钱给一穷人家维持生活.

sentences.en: He has gone for a week without sustenance.
sentences.cn: 他已经一星期未吃食物了.
我们怎样维持生活 呢 ?

sentences.en: In rudderless despair and searching for ideological sustenance, he contemplated religion.
sentences.cn: 在失去航向的绝望中,在寻求精神食粮的过程中, 他想到了宗教.

sentences.en: May be said to be a dependent. Spiritual sustenance.
sentences.cn: 或许可以说成是一种依赖. 心灵的寄托.

sentences.en: Potatoes were their only means of sustenance.
sentences.cn: 马铃薯是他们唯一的食物。

sentences.en: Say: " Who gives you sustenance, from the heavens and the earth? "
sentences.cn: 你说: “ 谁从天上和地下供给你们? ”

sentences.en: The currents of air that the walls of the ship direct upwards, as well as in line of its course are enough to give the great bird with its immense wings sufficent sustenance and progress.
sentences.cn: 沿着船壁向上引导的以及与航行方向一致的气流足以给这种长有特大翅膀的大鸟以充分的支撑力和前进力.

sentences.en: The earth brings forth large crops every year for the sustenance of man and beast.
sentences.cn: 大地每年生产出大量的农作物,供人畜食用.

sentences.en: There is much sustenance in a cucumber.
There's not much sustenance in a bowl of soup.
They wanted to see him, because they wanted to draw a certain sustenance from his strength.
sentences.cn: 他们想见到他, 因为他们想从他的实力里吸取某种养料.

sentences.en: We derive our sustenance from the land.
Without sustenance, the animals will soon die.
sentences.cn: 没有食物，动物很快就会死亡。

words.tran_cn: 支持者，维持者；主发动机；支撑的人物

trans.tran_en: food that people or animals need in order to live
